short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically connect Twitter likes and bookmarks to Are.na channels

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Pidgin streamlines the process of connecting tweets that you've liked or bookmarked to Are.na by automating it. 

Just log into your Are.na account, provide the channels for your liked and/or bookmarked tweets to connect to, and let the extension handle the rest. 

Now, when you like or bookmark something on Twitter, the tweet is automatically connected to your Are.na channels.
